EmailTemplate.subject: Free webinar: Aircraft Connectivity, AviationWeek, June 7
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Cabin Connectivity
Free Online Webinar Topic: How to use wi-fi to stream video and download files without exceeding your budget!
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER FREE <[[http://pages.aviationweek.com/Streaming-Wifi-without-Exceeding-Your-Budget]]>
If you think using Wi-Fi to stream the latest video conference or Hollywood blockbuster will exceed your operating budget – think again. Honeywell’s GoDirect services, applications and tools can dramatically reduce the consumption of airtime without compromising your passenger experience. Get total control of the data usage on your aircraft with tools from this webinar. Date 7 June, 2018
Time 2 PM GMT
Location AviationWeek <[[http://pages.aviationweek.com/Streaming-Wifi-without-Exceeding-Your-Budget?partnerref=AWnvite1&utm_rid=CPEN1000005582428&utm_campaign=14368&utm_medium=email&elq2=8dbe7cb12e934835ab73d34e3e01d698]]> Network <[[http://pages.aviationweek.com/Streaming-Wifi-without-Exceeding-Your-Budget]]>
The webinar will help you to:
Stream video without subscribing to the most expensive data package
Choose a configuration and data plan that provides the best streaming video capabilities in the air
Identify savings of up to $100,000 per aircraft annually through better control of connectivity services and usage
REGISTER AT AVIATION WEEK <[[http://pages.aviationweek.com/Streaming-Wifi-without-Exceeding-Your-Budget]]>
